Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that allows people to communicate over a long distance using sound.
The student can include in their drawing two students using the device to talk to each other.
The student can clearly show that their device uses string to carry sound from one student to the other.
The student can depict the device using only the materials that are typically available (like cups and string).
The student can illustrate the importance of the device by showing its usefulness in helping people communicate over long distances.
